description:
If you have ever been enjoying some Smarties and thought “these would be even better with more chocolate...” then this bar is for you. Ritter has added the satisfying chocolate and candy crunch of Smarties to their smooth milk chocolate bar, creating a treat for the chocolate lovers and the candy lovers. As part of Ritter’s seasonal collection, this bar is only here for a limited time, so enjoy it while you can.

  • Ingredients: sugar, cocoa butter, Smarties (sugar, skimmed milk powder, cocoa mass, cocoa butter, wheat flour, butterfat, whey powder, rice starch, emulsifier: soya lecithin, colour (beetroot red, carotenes, curcumin), spirulina concentrate, glazing agent (carnauba wax, white beeswax), barley malt extract, plant concentrates (safflower, radish)), cocoa mass, whole milk powder, lactose, skim milk powder, butterfat, emulsifier: soya lecithin
  • Contains: gluten and soy
  • May contain peanuts, other tree nuts, and eggs
name: Ritter Sport Smarties in Milk Chocolate Bar
